list_definition.definition: a gap; an empty or uncovered place

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: I couldn’t find a space for my car.

list_definition.definition: room; the absence of objects; the area available for use

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Have you enough space to turn round?
Is there space for one more?

list_definition.definition: (often outer space) the region outside the Earth’s atmosphere, in which all stars and other planets etc are situated
(also space out) to set (things) apart from one another

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He spaced the rows of potatoes half a metre apart.
